name: nano-cc-compiler-server
description: Windows-based backend server for Nano CC Compiler with lexical analysis support

scripts.clean: rimraf lexical/*.exe lexical/*.c lexical/parseTable.txt error.txt output.exe
scripts.postinstall: node -e "require('child_process').exec('dot -V', (e, so, se) => {if(e){console.warn('WARNING: Graphviz (dot) is not installed. Please install it from https://graphviz.gitlab.io/download/');}})"
scripts.prepare: echo 'NOTE: This project requires Windows-specific tools: Graphviz (dot), GCC, Lex, win_bison, and Git Bash to be installed and available in your PATH.'
